x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | offval.1 | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 2 |  | offval.2 | |- ( ph -> G Fn B ) |
| 3 |  | offval.3 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 4 |  | offval.4 | |- ( ph -> B e. W ) |
| 5 |  | offval.5 | |- ( A i^i B ) = S |
| 6 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. S |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) = ( x e. S |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_fnmpti | |- ( x e. S |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) Fn S |
| 9 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) = ( F ` x ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( G ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 9, 10 | #P_offval | |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = ( x e. S |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fneq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( F oF R G ) Fn S <-> ( x e. S |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) Fn S ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) Fn S ) |
